Alexandru Popescu wrote:

> Hmmmm... I think than we should use the sintagm: "JUnit uses a
> different test instance for each test method" and not something like
> "JUnit will instantiate the test for each test method".

I would prefer we speak the truth: "Don't assume JUnit will use the same 
or different instances for each test."
